title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 130.7 - Shipments for experimental and scientific purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 130.7 - Shipments for experimental and scientific purposes

State Regulations

Regulated articles may be moved from the quarantined area
for experimental or scientific purposes, on such conditions and under such
safeguards as may be approved by the commissioner. The container of articles so
moved shall bear, securely attached to the outside thereof, a certificate
showing compliance with such conditions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
130.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
